posts.message:
Anyone has a list of nice hooks for pre-commit? mainly for jslint, csslint. 

Thank youz,
Mohamed

Sign in first (top right, just normal MS account) so you can vote.

RT @xunit: If you want to use @xunit in Visual Studio 14, please vote for this Connect bug: https://t.co/gSOMKEjEYg
